# Open Badges by Firmament Works

Open Badges by Firmament Works is domain-bound trust infrastructure for issuing, signing, and verifying Open Badges and VC-compatible credential JSON.

This file lists markdown-first docs that are easier for LLMs and automation agents to consume.
